passive.name: Flowers and Butterflies
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. While the wearer is in battle, for every {{2}} SPD that exceeds 100, increases DMG dealt by Basic ATK and Skill by <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. At the same time, increases the CRIT DMG of Ultimate by <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. This effect can stack up to {{5}} time(s).
